ygData.subject: Re: Even more on ebw...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... but ... and ... that ... First off, no, there is no way in hell that your party of 20s or 22s can kill Arlena. She is in Mistmoore and she is a gyspy.
ygData.messageBody:
> > I'm thinking it's feasible with a few 22s (give or take a few levels)
but
> > what I wish I knew now is where Arlena spawned.
> > And as a side note, how can a dark elven sk get to Dekam N'Tazi?
>
> Is this just a guess or do you have knowledge that this is the correct
> level? It will be a pain in the butt to get my friends to go over there,
and
> I don't want to gett ehre and find she'll kick our butts. :)
>
> On the side note -- According to Allakhazam's (everquest.gamestats.com)
that
> NPC is in Neriak. Dunno who is right or wrong.

First off, no, there is no way in hell that your party of 20s or 22s can
kill Arlena. She is in Mistmoore and she is a gyspy. Getting to Mistmoore is
a slight pain unless you can teleport over somewhere near there (and back).
Arlena is at least level 30. I say this because even the UNNAMED gyspy
musicians in Mistmoore are level 30, and they all can CHARM quite well. So,
be careful.

Dekam N'Tazi may very well be in Neriak. N'Tazi sounds like a dark elf name
anyway. It was an assumption of mine he would be in Qeynos (cuz almost all
the quests in the west have something to do with Qeynos). If the site says
he's in Neriak, he's in Neriak. Come to think of it, that's actually a GOOD
thing. ;)

DV
